about_the_game:
Welcome to Smash Room: The Ultimate Destruction Experience!

In Smash Room, every session is an opportunity to unleash your inner chaos. Dive into an experience where you can let go of your frustrations in a safe and fun way. Our experience is designed to provide instant relief by allowing you to destroy everything in your path with a variety of tools and weapons.

Game Features:
  • Varied Environments: From cosy offices to castle courtyard, each room offers unique items to destroy.
  • Arsenal of Destruction: Choose from baseball bats, sledgehammers, and even a bow to wreck rooms. Each tool offers a different destruction experience.
  • Challenge Modes: Engage in timed challenges, precision destruction missions, and creative smashing sprees to earn special rewards.
  • Free Play: Just want to smash something? Free play allows you to summon objects to smash with a variety of weapons.
  • Stress Relief & Fun: Perfect for winding down after a long day or whenever you need a break from reality.

Why Smash Room?
Smash Room is more than just a game; it's a therapeutic journey. The experience of breaking things can help reduce stress and provide a sense of satisfaction. Our realistic physics and stunning graphics will make you feel like you're really in the room, smashing things to pieces.

Download Smash Room today and start your smashing adventure!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR
